ingredients: 5 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
instructions: Whisk vinegar, soy sauce, olive oil, parsley, basil, oregano, garlic powder, and black pepper together in a bowl and pour into a resealable plastic bag. Add chicken, coat with the marinade, squeeze out excess air, and seal the bag. Marinate in the refrigerator, at least 4 hours.
Preheat grill for medium-low heat and lightly oil the grate. Drain and discard marinade.

Grill chicken on the preheated grill until no longer pink in the center, 4 to 5 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
title: Grilled Chicken Marinade
sentences: Whisk vinegar, soy sauce, olive oil, parsley, basil, oregano, garlic powder, and black pepper together in a bowl and pour into a resealable plastic bag.
Add chicken, coat with the marinade, squeeze out excess air, and seal the bag.
Marinate in the refrigerator, at least 4 hours.
Preheat grill for medium-low heat and lightly oil the grate.
Grill chicken on the preheated grill until no longer pink in the center, 4 to 5 minutes per side.
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
